item.title: My DRY implementation of GET rest-point
item.description: Introduction For long time I was interested in finding the most simple, small, flexible and the same time efficient implementation of GET rest-points. So in this article I will try to share my findings and hope you discover something interesting for you. And to make it easier to explain and understand let’s design and implement simple application with a couple of entities. Design application Assume we need to develop simple application to serve data about people and theirs cats.
